QuestData.Title: A Humble Offering
QuestData.Description: I'm almost ready for the ritual, there's just one more thing we need: An offering.$B$BRelax, I don't mean a sacrifice. Just a bit of food.$B$BThere are sure to be mushrooms growing in Tideview Thicket to the northwest that are suitable for this. Please bring some.
QuestData.LogDescription: Gather 10 Tidemist Caps from Tideview Thicket.
QuestData.RewardText: Thank you, $p. These mushrooms may not seem like much of an offering, but the sentiment alone will be enough to draw the spirits to us.$B$BAlso, they make a pretty fine stir-fry.
